Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-37434 affecting package crash for versions less than 8.0.4-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-37434 affecting package crash for versions less than 8.0.4-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package crash is earlier than 8.0.4-2, affected by CVE-2022-37434
